text: The greatest ending theme in video history and arguably one of the great gaming themes ever.  Still get goose bumps to this day.  What a rapturous end to an adventure that for me has yet to be surpassed in the JRPG market.

text:
Love this song.

Here the lyrics:

Latin

Caelum hume sitien taire
Vertus sahrel shamasantia
Ecce valde generous ale posselna volucritus
Sona areru ec paldeel?
Sona mi areru ec sancitu?
Ale posselna volucritus

Tenna prena posteri dire
Vertus narrel mea chorus
Aude valde generous sana fiare actertis
Sona areru ec paldeel?
Sona mi areru ec sancitu?
Sana fiare actertisia

English Translation

In the sky, the earth, and the beloved sea,
The Knower of Truth hath appeared
Look - The precious Winged One takes flight
Art thou the bringer of ruin?
Art thou the holy one?
The Winged One takes flight

I shall tell you the wishes of time,
I shall sing the tale of truth
Listen - That precious voice spins the everlasting story
Art thou the bringer of ruin?
Art thou the holy one?
That voice spins the everlasting story

text: I have 3 copies of this amazing game, 2 sealed. I worked Sesoanl at Toys R Us when I was 17 and read how few copies were made of it. I bought all 3 copies we received for 30 each. I'm never selling them. I don't want to sound biased since I'm not a big fan of RPG's. But this game, in my opinion is as close to "Perfect" as a game can get in my eyes. Sega needs to get their act together and Re-code this game and release it. They can salvage the audio, it's flawless. We need this with modern grafx.
